member.name: M:Aveva.Core.UserRolePermissions.IUserPermissions.HasPermission(System.String,Aveva.Core.Database.DbElement)
member.summary: determines whether use has permission to the given role or not
member.returns: returns true if the user has permission to the given role

member.name: M:Aveva.Core.UserRolePermissions.IUserPermissions.CanCreateTag(Aveva.Core.Database.DbElement)
member.summary: Determines whether user can create tag or not
member.returns: returns true if the user has the permission to create tag

member.name: M:Aveva.Core.UserRolePermissions.IUserPermissions.CanDeleteTag(Aveva.Core.Database.DbElement)
member.summary: Determines whether user can delete tag or not
member.returns: returns true if the user has the permission to delete tag
